name: @smithy-cdk/hi-bye-api-extensions
description: Convert the quickstart guide Smithy model into the [OpenAPI](https://spec.openapis.org/oas/latest.html) format.

scripts.preinstall: smithy build && npm i build/smithy/ts-client/typescript-codegen --no-save && npm run build --prefix ./build/smithy/ts-client/typescript-codegen
